page.title: 08AMERICA FARM
page.content: Mr.Buckingham rents 102 acres of {AMERICA FARM}from Cambridgeshire County Council at Â£60 an acre which turns out to be Â£6120 a year. Mr. Buckingham owns 5 corn storage bins,3 tractors,1 combine harvester,1 sugar beet drill and a corn drill.Fertilizer is one of the most important things on a farm.Winter wheat needs 2 cwt per acre and for sugar beet you need 4 cwt per acre.On the farm Mr.Buckingham grows sugar beet,winter barley,spring barley,winter wheat,spring wheat,peas and oats.Mr.Buckingham has a family of 3-himself,his wife and his 4 year old daughter.Mr.Buckingham has been on the farm since 2 and now he's 38.Mr. Buckingham has 3 cats but he used to have 5.The other 2 were eaten by foxes and fox cubs.Mr.Buckingham gets up at 6.30 to start work at 7.At 12 he has lunch and then continues work to 9.
